q: Senate Democrats may support raising the retirement age. But he said there is also a faction of the caucus, led by Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid ( D-Nev.), staunchly opposed to benefits cuts. I raised my concerns on this payroll tax holiday and it was raised by a number of other Democrats- Harry Reid was very strong on the Social Security issue, Sen. Bernie Sanders said. legislation and federal appointments. The binding resolution, which passed 92-4, requires public disclosure within two days of an objection being made by any senator to Senate action on legislation or nominations. Passage of this resolution is a victory for accountability. It will establish transparency with the significant power each senator holds to stop legislation and nominations, Chuck Grassley said.- Tom Latham Beaumont Mike Pence won't run, for president anyway Caucus junkies confounded by the late formal start of campaigning but long lists of possible candidates can cross

"I believe Larry is ready" to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this."
